verses.verse: שִׁלְחוּ־ <WH7971> Send כַ֥ר <WH3733> ye the lamb מֹשֵֽׁל־ <WH4910> to the ruler אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִסֶּ֣לַע <WH5554> from Sela מִדְבָּ֑רָה <WH4057> to the wilderness אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֖ר <WH2022> unto the mount בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> of Zion

וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become כְעוֹף־ <WH5775> bird נוֹדֵ֖ד <WH5074> For it shall be [that] as a wandering קֵ֣ן <WH7064> of the nest מְשֻׁלָּ֑ח <WH7971> cast out תִּֽהְיֶ֙ינָה֙ <WH1961> become בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> [so] the daughters מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab מַעְבָּרֹ֖ת <WH4569> shall be at the fords לְאַרְנֽוֹן׃ <WH769> of Arnon

[הָבִיאוּ כ] (הָבִ֤יאִי <WH935> abide ק) עֵצָה֙ <WH6098> counsel עֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> execute פְלִילָ֔ה <WH6415> judgment שִׁ֧יתִי <WH7896> make כַלַּ֛יִל <WH3915> as the night צִלֵּ֖ךְ <WH6738> thy shadow בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst צָהֳרָ֑יִם <WH6672> of the noonday סַתְּרִי֙ <WH5641> hide נִדָּחִ֔ים <WH5080> the outcasts נֹדֵ֖ד <WH5074> not him that wandereth אַל־ <WH408> not תְּגַלִּֽי׃ <WH1540> bewray

יָג֤וּרוּ <WH1481> dwell בָךְ֙ נִדָּחַ֔י <WH5080> Let mine outcasts מוֹאָ֛ב <WH4124> with thee Moab הֱוִי־ <WH1933> be סֵ֥תֶר <WH5643> thou a covert לָ֖מוֹ מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> to them from the face שׁוֹדֵ֑ד <WH7703> of the spoiler כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָפֵ֤ס <WH656> is at an end הַמֵּץ֙ <WH4160> for the extortioner כָּ֣לָה <WH3615> ceaseth שֹׁ֔ד <WH7701> the spoiler תַּ֥מּוּ <WH8552> are consumed רֹמֵ֖ס <WH7429> the oppressors מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> out of the land

וְהוּכַ֤ן <WH3559> be established בַּחֶ֙סֶד֙ <WH2617> And in mercy כִּסֵּ֔א <WH3678> shall the throne וְיָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> and he shall sit עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> on בֶּאֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> upon it in truth בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David שֹׁפֵ֛ט <WH8199> judging וְדֹרֵ֥שׁ <WH1875> and seeking מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> judgment וּמְהִ֥ר <WH4106> and hasting צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH6664> righteousness

שָׁמַ֥עְנוּ <WH8085> We have heard גְאוֹן־ <WH1347> of the pride מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab גֵּ֣א <WH1341> proud מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [he is] very גַּאֲוָת֧וֹ <WH1346> [even] of his haughtiness וּגְאוֹנ֛וֹ <WH1347> and his pride וְעֶבְרָת֖וֹ <WH5678> and his wrath לֹא־ <WH3808> not כֵ֥ן <WH3651> after that בַּדָּֽיו׃ <WH907> [but] his lies ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore יְיֵלִ֥יל <WH3213> howl מוֹאָ֛ב <WH4124> Therefore shall Moab לְמוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> for Moab כֻּלֹּ֣ה <WH3605> everyone יְיֵלִ֑יל <WH3213> every one shall howl לַאֲשִׁישֵׁ֧י <WH808> for the foundations קִיר־ חֲרֶ֛שֶׂת <WH7025> of Kirhareseth תֶּהְגּ֖וּ <WH1897> shall ye mourn אַךְ־ <WH389> are utterly נְכָאִֽים׃ <WH5218> surely [they are] stricken

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For שַׁדְמוֹת֩ <WH7709> For the fields חֶשְׁבּ֨וֹן <WH2809> of Heshbon אֻמְלָ֜ל <WH535> languish גֶּ֣פֶן <WH1612> [and] the vine שִׂבְמָ֗ה <WH7643> of Sibmah בַּעֲלֵ֤י <WH1167> the lords גוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> of the heathen הָלְמ֣וּ <WH1986> have broken down שְׂרוּקֶּ֔יהָ <WH8291> the principal plants עַד־ <WH5704> far יַעְזֵ֥ר <WH3270> [even] unto Jazer נָגָ֖עוּ <WH5060> thereof they are come תָּ֣עוּ <WH8582> they wandered מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> [through] the wilderness שְׁלֻ֣חוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH7976> her branches נִטְּשׁ֖וּ <WH5203> are stretched out עָ֥בְרוּ <WH5674> they are gone over יָֽם׃ <WH3220> the sea

עַל־ <WH5921> over כֵּ֡ן <WH3651> after that אֶבְכֶּ֞ה <WH1058> Therefore I will bewail בִּבְכִ֤י <WH1065> with the weeping יַעְזֵר֙ <WH3270> of Jazer גֶּ֣פֶן <WH1612> the vine שִׂבְמָ֔ה <WH7643> of Sibmah אֲרַיָּ֙וֶךְ֙ <WH7301> I will water דִּמְעָתִ֔י <WH1832> thee with my tears חֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <WH2809> O Heshbon וְאֶלְעָלֵ֑ה <WH500> and Elealeh כִּ֧י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> over קֵיצֵ֛ךְ <WH7019> for thy summer fruits וְעַל־ <WH5921> over קְצִירֵ֖ךְ <WH7105> and for thy harvest הֵידָ֥ד <WH1959> for the shouting נָפָֽל׃ <WH5307> is fallen

וְנֶאֱסַ֨ף <WH622> is taken away שִׂמְחָ֤ה <WH8057> And gladness וָגִיל֙ <WH1524> and joy מִן־ <WH4480> from הַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <WH3759> out of the plentiful field וּבַכְּרָמִ֥ים <WH3754> and in the vineyards לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יְרֻנָּ֖ן <WH7442> there shall be no singing לֹ֣א <WH3808> No יְרֹעָ֑ע <WH7321> neither shall there be shouting יַ֗יִן <WH3196> no wine בַּיְקָבִ֛ים <WH3342> in [their] presses לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No יִדְרֹ֥ךְ <WH1869> the treaders הַדֹּרֵ֖ךְ <WH1869> shall tread out הֵידָ֥ד <WH1959> I have made [their vintage] shouting הִשְׁבַּֽתִּי׃ <WH7673> to cease

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that מֵעַ֣י <WH4578> Wherefore my bowels לְמוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> for Moab כַּכִּנּ֖וֹר <WH3658> like an harp יֶֽהֱמ֑וּ <WH1993> shall sound וְקִרְבִּ֖י <WH7130> and mine inward parts לְקִ֥יר חָֽרֶשׂ׃ <WH7025> for Kirharesh

וְהָיָ֧ה <WH1961> will come כִֽי־ <WH3588> when נִרְאָ֛ה <WH7200> And it shall come to pass when it is seen כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When נִלְאָ֥ה <WH3811> is weary מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> that Moab עַל־ <WH5921> and הַבָּמָ֑ה <WH1116> on the high place וּבָ֧א <WH935> that he shall come אֶל־ <WH413> to his מִקְדָּשׁ֛וֹ <WH4720> to his sanctuary לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <WH6419> to pray וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> he will not יוּכָֽל׃ <WH3201> but he shall not prevail

זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> This [is] the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> concerning מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> concerning Moab מֵאָֽז׃ <WH227> since that time

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> But now the LORD לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying בְּשָׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> Within three שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years כִּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8141> as the years שָׂכִ֔יר <WH7916> of an hireling וְנִקְלָה֙ <WH7034> shall be contemned כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> and the glory מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all הֶהָמ֣וֹן <WH1995> multitude הָרָ֑ב <WH7227> with all that great וּשְׁאָ֥ר <WH7605> and the remnant מְעַ֛ט <WH4592> [shall be] very מִזְעָ֖ר <WH4213> small ל֥וֹא <WH3808> not כַבִּֽיר׃ <WH3524> feeble ס
